# core/time

**Role Path**: `roles/core/time`

## Description
**Time Synchronization**
Ensures accurate system time via idempotent installation and configuration of time synchronization services (Chrony).

## Key Tasks
- Install time synchronization service (idempotent)
- Configure secure time synchronization (idempotent)
- Enable and start time synchronization service (idempotent)
- Verify time synchronization is working (idempotent)
- Validate time synchronization quality (idempotent)

## Default Variables
- `time_service_mapping`
